full_summary:
### Project Overview
#### Computational Infrastructure Project (zero start date)

* **Title:** Project Manager - TBIPS
* **Reference Number:** 21120-24-4525064
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Publication Date:** January 15, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 7, 2024

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking the professionalism of one (1) Level 3 Project Manager to support its Corporate Financial Management System priorities and initiatives, such as modernizing the Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system. The candidate will be part of the National Comptrollership Branch and will report to the Operations Manager.

### Client and Technical Profiles
* **Client:** Correctional Service Canada (CSC)
* **Location:** 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 0P9, Canada
* **Technical Specifications:**
	+ Level 3 Project Manager
	+ Expertise in implementing modern systems
	+ Excellent communication and management skills

### Packages Offered
* **No of packages:** 1
* **Estimated Delivery Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Contract Duration:** 1 year (with 2 additional 1-year option periods)

### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Interested bidders must meet the evaluation criteria as outlined in the tender documents.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:
* **Technical Proposal:** 20%
* **Cost Proposal:** 15%
* **Management Team:** 15%
* **Appendix:** 50%

### Notice to Tenderers
Tenderers must submit their proposal to the Contracting Authority by the specified deadline. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The tender documents are available upon request.

### Business Supplier Registry (BSR)/Vendor of Record (VOR)
* **BSR Identification Number:** None
* **Registration Date:** N/A

### Tender Documents
* **Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents:** Available upon request
* **Evaluation Criteria and submitted scenarios:** N/A

Please note, this is a repost of a previous call for tenders. A link to the previous call can be found below. Previous call:  [Link]

You can request the full Request for Proposal (RFP) for more detailed information regarding the project. Please respond to this email to confirm
